title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: This bug report is related to the issue of the maximized state of the view not being preserved when switching perspectives.
OB: The observed behavior is not provided, which makes it difficult to fully understand the problem.
EB: The expected behavior is that the CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching perspectives. It's stated that 'A view that is maximized should stay maximized,' which is a clear expectation.
SR: To effectively address this issue, please provide the steps to reproduce the problem. These steps will help in understanding and fixing the problem.
